If looking for ladies clothing, stop at Daspy Fashions in the Alpine Village Shopping Centre.  Men can shop at Style Trend Clothiers in the downtown core.

True local shopping experience, offering great selection and unparalleled customer service. Clarks, Ecco, Josef Siebel, El Naturalista, Ms Moo, Scarpa, Dunham, Nike, New Balance, and so much more!
content=Outabounds sports a rustic but relaxed atmosphere, with wood burl tables and cordovan leather couches. A great place for an appres ski.

content=Casual fine dinning with cozy atmosphere, Patio and fire places.  Duck Confit, Jambalaya, chorizo pasta, Beef tenderloin...and a good selection of BC wines.  If you like good food, it worths the detour !!!

, Trans Canada Hwy #1, 250 837 5119.  Western themed restaurant located conveniently right off the highway.  Not the fastest, but good food, and a nice place to stop for lunch.

content=A bar offering good food and drink and retro ski decor, ideal for apr√®s or dinner after a day on the mountain. Their homemade pizza is a highlight.

content=Authentic British style Pub with 17 beers on tap and excellent food. Cozy up to the couches by the fireplace after day of skiing or stop in at night and check out whichever band is on stage. Live music 4 nights a week.
